refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This block reads MicroDAQ volatile memory. Block can be used to pass data to Standalone or Ext application generated from Xcos diagram. User has to provide 'Start index' which points to beginning or memory area. The 'Size' block parameter defines overall size of the memory which block reads data from. 'Vector size' defines size of signal read by block. The 'Init value' parameter allows user to initialize memory with provided value. The last parameter determines how data will be read - if "Circular" is enabled (value 1) block returns data in every model step, if the end of memory region is reached blocks starts from beginning or the memory area. If 'Circular' is disabled block returns data in every model step, if the end of memory region is reached block returns value from the end of memory region.
In order to write data (which will be read by this block) mdaq_mem_set() toolbox function can be used.

simplelist.member: mdaq_mem_write : Writes data to MicroDAQ memory
